mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.task_no, a.task_name, a.status, a.startline, a.deadline, b.nickname AS publishUser FROM lvye_assessment_task a LEFT JOIN system_users b ON a.publish_user_id = b.id WHERE a.task_no in ( select task_no from lvye_assessment_user_task where user_id = #{userId} and parent_flag = #{isParent} and deleted = 0 ) and a.status in (1,2) and a.deleted = 0
